sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { image, title, location: propertyLocation, price, description } = location.state || {}; return ( <>

{title || "Luxury Apartment"}

{description || "Villas"}

{propertyLocation || "1234 Rental St, Property City, PC 56789"}

Price: ${price || "N/A"}

{/* Booking Form */}

Book Your Stay

{/* Form fields */}
{/* Other form fields */} {/* Centered Button */}
); }; export default Booking;
